bill.summary:
Reauthorization of the National Advisory Committee on Institutional Quality and Integrity Act
This bill permanently authorizes the National Advisory Committee on Institutional Quality and Integrity, which advises the Department of Education on the college accreditation process and the eligibility of institutions of higher education to participate in federal student aid programs.
